name: Last Alive
description: Be the last survivor: save the world possessed by the undead, or witness its end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
